text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires stating that the Windsor Framework was negotiated by the Sunak Government to ease the burden of the NI Protocol and was approved by the UK Parliament on 22 March 2023. Crucially, the candidate answer correctly identifies the Framework as the solution to the Protocol's burden.
